text:
Oh Micaela! Shoot! That must be soo frustrating. Thanks for letting me know how it went. I'm sorry visas are such a pain. I really wish they weren't such a barrier in this world. It's really unfair.

I completely respect your overall point of view on this situation though. It is a credit to you that they offered you the job, and you should be proud of that! 

I am really impressed with your dedication, and I just know you are headed for awesome things in this industry, especially if you continue to approach it with as much passion and hard work as you already have. 

Goodbye Kansas would be a great opportunity too! That's such great news that you are receiving all this interest. You are clearly doing things right.

I hope you have a nice vacation and some good rest in Argentina, you deserve both!

Hi Micaela 

Happy New Year! I'm so sorry for the delayed response. I thought a response I wrote before Christmas had been sent, but just now realised it was 'undelivered'. Slack is not great for me sometimes when it comes to unsent messages :(
